title: Calories in PB2 Powdered Peanut Butter
meta_description: Discover calories in PB2, the low-calorie powdered peanut butter alternative, including full nutrition per serving, macros, and preparation tips.
h1: Calories in PB2 Powdered Peanut Butter
assumptions: Unprepared PB2 powdered peanut butter; standard 2 tbsp serving (13 g); no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, batch, and preparation method. Values based on PB2 original; check packaging for exact details.

quick_answer.text: One 2 tbsp serving of PB2 has 60 kcal, 6 g protein, and just 1.5 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp peanut oil per serving for creamier texture

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of PB2?
faqs.a: About 60 kcal per 2 tbsp (13 g) serving.

faqs.q: Is PB2 lower in calories than regular peanut butter?
faqs.a: Yes, PB2 has 60 kcal per serving vs. ~190 kcal for 2 tbsp regular peanut butter.

faqs.q: What are the macros in PB2?
faqs.a: 6 g protein, 5 g carbs (2 g fiber), 1.5 g fat per serving.
Yes, about 2 g sugars per serving from natural peanut sugars and minimal processing.

faqs.q: How to use PB2 in recipes?
faqs.a: Mix with water for spread, or add to smoothies, baking, or oatmeal for low-fat peanut flavor.
